title: Sarah Silverman | Trump Loses Major Court Case Over Secret Jan. 6 Records Sought by Congress: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at a judge ruling that official records from the Trump White House could be turned over to the congressional committee investigating the January 6 insurrection.

Then, Sarah Silverman talks about her new series Santa Inc., how important Jewish people are to the Christmas holiday and meeting Seth Rogen for the first time.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
